verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Mother of mine, sweet virgin pure
Lead me to the cross of Jesus
Show now to me how He loves me
To have paid my debts, oh so freely

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Teach me to love Him with all my heart
To serve and obey Him all the days of my life

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Mother of mine, please pray for me
So that I may be the light of Jesus
I place in your care all my despair
And my fears that keep me from knowing Him

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Mother of mine, Holy Queen
Your beauty shows me your purity
I want to be as pure as thee
So that I may see the face of Jesus
